title: President Pro Tem
description: A month after an election that will turn the country over to a new president, Carla Hamilton, fashion model turn politician-and the first African American woman to serve as vice president of the United States-receives startling The sitting president has died so she will occupy the Oval Office for only six weeks. She soon discovers in Washington, D.C. a great deal can happen in six weeks.
author: Kelvin L. Reed
